(* For primitive integers and floats  *)
From Coq Require Numbers.Cyclic.Int63.Int63 Floats.PrimFloat Floats.FloatAxioms.
From MetaCoq.Template Require Import utils BasicAst Universes.
Require Import ssreflect.
From Equations Require Import Equations.

(* Some reflection / EqDec lemmata *)

Class ReflectEq A := {
  eqb : A -> A -> bool ;
  eqb_spec : forall x y : A, reflect (x = y) (eqb x y)
}.


A:Type
H:ReflectEq A
x, y:A
eqb x y -> x = y


A:Type
H:ReflectEq A
x, y:A
eqb x y -> x = y

  
A:Type
H:ReflectEq A
x, y:A
x <> y -> false -> x = y

  discriminate.
Qed.


forall A : Type, ReflectEq A -> EqDec A


forall A : Type, ReflectEq A -> EqDec A

  
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
{x = y} + {x <> y}

  
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
e:x = y
{x = y} + {x <> y}
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
n:x <> y
{x = y} + {x <> y}

  
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
e:x = y
{x = y} + {x <> y}
 
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
e:x = y
x = y
 assumption.
  
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
n:x <> y
{x = y} + {x <> y}
 
A:Type
eqb:A -> A -> bool
h:forall x0 y0 : A, reflect (x0 = y0) (eqb x0 y0)
x, y:A
n:x <> y
x <> y
 assumption.
Defined.

Definition eq_dec_to_bool {A} `{EqDec A} x y :=
  match eq_dec x y with
  | left _ => true
  | right _ => false
  end.

(* Not an instance to avoid loops? *)

forall A : Type, EqDec A -> ReflectEq A


forall A : Type, EqDec A -> ReflectEq A

  
A:Type
h:EqDec A
ReflectEq A

  
A:Type
h:EqDec A
A -> A -> bool
A:Type
h:EqDec A
forall x y : A, reflect (x = y) (?eqb x y)

  
A:Type
h:EqDec A
A -> A -> bool
 eapply eq_dec_to_bool.
  
A:Type
h:EqDec A
forall x y : A, reflect (x = y) (eq_dec_to_bool x y)
 
A:Type
h:EqDec A
forall x y : A,
reflect (x = y) (if eq_dec x y then true else false)

    
A:Type
h:EqDec A
x, y:A
reflect (x = y) (if eq_dec x y then true else false)
 
A:Type
h:EqDec A
x, y:A
e:x = y
reflect (x = y) true
A:Type
h:EqDec A
x, y:A
n:x <> y
reflect (x = y) false

    all: constructor ; assumption.
Defined.

Ltac nodec :=
  let bot := fresh "bot" in
  try solve [ constructor ; intro bot ; inversion bot ; subst ; tauto ].

Definition eq_option {A} (eqA : A -> A -> bool) (u v : option A) : bool :=
  match u, v with
  | Some u, Some v => eqA u v
  | None, None => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.


forall A : Type, ReflectEq A -> ReflectEq (option A)


forall A : Type, ReflectEq A -> ReflectEq (option A)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
ReflectEq (option A)
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
forall x y : option A,
reflect (x = y) (eq_option eqb x y)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
x, y:option A
reflect (x = y) (eq_option eqb x y)
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a, a0:A
reflect (Some a = Some a0)
  (eq_option eqb (Some a) (Some a0))
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
reflect (Some a = None) (eq_option eqb (Some a) None)
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
reflect (None = Some a) (eq_option eqb None (Some a))
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
reflect (None = None) (eq_option eqb None None)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a, a0:A
reflect (Some a = Some a0) (eqb a a0)
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
reflect (Some a = None) false
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
reflect (None = Some a) false
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
reflect (None = None) true

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a, a0:A
reflect (Some a = Some a0) (eqb a a0)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a, a0:A
e:a = a0
reflect (Some a = Some a0) true

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a, a0:A
e:a = a0
Some a = Some a0
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a, a0:A
e:a = a0
a = a0
 assumption.
Defined.

Fixpoint eq_list {A} (eqA : A -> A -> bool) (l l' : list A) : bool :=
  match l, l' with
  | a :: l, a' :: l' =>
    if eqA a a' then eq_list eqA l l'
    else false
  | [], [] => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.


forall A : Type, ReflectEq A -> ReflectEq (list A)


forall A : Type, ReflectEq A -> ReflectEq (list A)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
ReflectEq (list A)
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
forall x y : list A, reflect (x = y) (eq_list eqb x y)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
x:list A
forall y : list A, reflect (x = y) (eq_list eqb x y)
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
reflect ([] = []) (eq_list eqb [] [])
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
y:list A
reflect ([] = a :: y) (eq_list eqb [] (a :: y))
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y : list A, reflect (x = y) (eq_list eqb x y)
reflect (a :: x = []) (eq_list eqb (a :: x) [])
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (x = y0) (eq_list eqb x y0)
a0:A
y:list A
reflect (a :: x = a0 :: y)
  (eq_list eqb (a :: x) (a0 :: y))

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
reflect ([] = []) (eq_list eqb [] [])
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
reflect ([] = []) true
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
[] = []
 reflexivity.
  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
y:list A
reflect ([] = a :: y) (eq_list eqb [] (a :: y))
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
y:list A
reflect ([] = a :: y) false
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
y:list A
[] <> a :: y
 discriminate.
  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y : list A, reflect (x = y) (eq_list eqb x y)
reflect (a :: x = []) (eq_list eqb (a :: x) [])
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y : list A, reflect (x = y) (eq_list eqb x y)
reflect (a :: x = []) false
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y : list A, reflect (x = y) (eq_list eqb x y)
a :: x <> []
 discriminate.
  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (x = y0) (eq_list eqb x y0)
a0:A
y:list A
reflect (a :: x = a0 :: y)
  (eq_list eqb (a :: x) (a0 :: y))
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (x = y0) (eq_list eqb x y0)
a0:A
y:list A
reflect (a :: x = a0 :: y)
  (if eqb a a0 then eq_list eqb x y else false)
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (x = y0) (eq_list eqb x y0)
a0:A
y:list A
e:a = a0
reflect (a :: x = a0 :: y) (eq_list eqb x y)

    
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
a:A
x:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (x = y0) (eq_list eqb x y0)
a0:A
y:list A
e:a = a0
e0:x = y
reflect (a :: x = a0 :: y) true

    
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
y:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (y = y0) (eq_list eqb y y0)
a0:A
reflect (a0 :: y = a0 :: y) true
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
y:list A
IHx:forall y0 : list A, reflect (y = y0) (eq_list eqb y y0)
a0:A
a0 :: y = a0 :: y
 reflexivity.
Defined.

Instance reflect_string : ReflectEq string := {
  eqb := eq_string
}.

x, y:string
reflect (x = y) (eq_string x y)

  
s, s':string
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')

  
s, s':string
e:s = s'
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')

  
s, s':string
e:s = s'
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')
 
s':string
reflect (s' = s') (eq_string s' s')
 
s':string
reflect (s' = s') true
 
s':string
s' = s'
 reflexivity.
  
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
string_compare s s' <> Eq
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:string_compare s s' <> Eq
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')

    
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
string_compare s s' <> Eq
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
bot:string_compare s s' = Eq
False
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
bot:string_compare s s' = Eq
s = s'
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
bot:string_compare s s' = Eq
string_compare s s' = Eq
 assumption. 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:string_compare s s' <> Eq
reflect (s = s') (eq_string s s')

    
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:string_compare s s' <> Eq
reflect (s = s')
  match string_compare s s' with
  | Eq => true
  | _ => false
  end
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Eq <> Eq
reflect (s = s') true
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Lt <> Eq
reflect (s = s') false
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Gt <> Eq
reflect (s = s') false

    
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Eq <> Eq
reflect (s = s') true
 tauto.
    
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Lt <> Eq
reflect (s = s') false
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Lt <> Eq
s <> s'
 assumption.
    
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Gt <> Eq
reflect (s = s') false
 
s, s':string
n:s <> s'
H:Gt <> Eq
s <> s'
 assumption.
Defined.

Instance reflect_nat : ReflectEq nat := {
  eqb_spec := Nat.eqb_spec
}.

#[program] 
Instance reflect_prim_int : ReflectEq Numbers.Cyclic.Int63.Int63.int :=
  { eqb := Numbers.Cyclic.Int63.Int63.eqb
}.

x, y:Int63.int
reflect (x = y) (Int63.eqb x y)

  
x, y:Int63.int
eq:Int63.eqb x y = true
x = y
x, y:Int63.int
eq:Int63.eqb x y = false
x <> y

  
x, y:Int63.int
eq:Int63.eqb x y = false
x <> y

  now apply (Numbers.Cyclic.Int63.Int63.eqb_false_spec x y) in eq.
Qed.
 
Derive NoConfusion EqDec for SpecFloat.spec_float.

Local Obligation Tactic := idtac.
#[program] 
Instance reflect_prim_float : ReflectEq PrimFloat.float :=
  { eqb x y := eqb (ReflectEq := EqDec_ReflectEq SpecFloat.spec_float) (FloatOps.Prim2SF x) (FloatOps.Prim2SF y) }.

forall x y : PrimFloat.float,
reflect (x = y)
  ((fun x0 y0 : PrimFloat.float =>
    eqb (FloatOps.Prim2SF x0) (FloatOps.Prim2SF y0)) x
     y)

  
x, y:PrimFloat.float
reflect (x = y)
  ((fun x0 y0 : PrimFloat.float =>
    eqb (FloatOps.Prim2SF x0) (FloatOps.Prim2SF y0)) x
     y)
 
x, y:PrimFloat.float
reflect (x = y)
  (eqb (FloatOps.Prim2SF x) (FloatOps.Prim2SF y))

  
x, y:PrimFloat.float
e:FloatOps.Prim2SF x = FloatOps.Prim2SF y
x = y
x, y:PrimFloat.float
n:FloatOps.Prim2SF x <> FloatOps.Prim2SF y
x <> y

  
x, y:PrimFloat.float
n:FloatOps.Prim2SF x <> FloatOps.Prim2SF y
x <> y

  
x, y:PrimFloat.float
n:FloatOps.Prim2SF x <> FloatOps.Prim2SF y
e:x = y
FloatOps.Prim2SF x = FloatOps.Prim2SF y
 
x, y:PrimFloat.float
n:FloatOps.Prim2SF x <> FloatOps.Prim2SF y
e:x = y
FloatOps.Prim2SF y = FloatOps.Prim2SF y

  reflexivity.
Qed.

Definition eq_level l1 l2 :=
  match l1, l2 with
  | Level.lSet, Level.lSet => true
  | Level.Level s1, Level.Level s2 => eqb s1 s2
  | Level.Var n1, Level.Var n2 => eqb n1 n2
  | _, _ => false
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_level : ReflectEq Level.t := {
  eqb := eq_level
}.

forall x y : Level.t, reflect (x = y) (eq_level x y)

  
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.lSet)
  (eq_level Level.lSet Level.lSet)
s:string
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.Level s)
  (eq_level Level.lSet (Level.Level s))
n:nat
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.Var n)
  (eq_level Level.lSet (Level.Var n))
s:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.lSet)
  (eq_level (Level.Level s) Level.lSet)
s, s0:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Level s0)
  (eq_level (Level.Level s) (Level.Level s0))
s:string
n:nat
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Var n)
  (eq_level (Level.Level s) (Level.Var n))
n:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.lSet)
  (eq_level (Level.Var n) Level.lSet)
n:nat
s:string
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Level s)
  (eq_level (Level.Var n) (Level.Level s))
n, n0:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Var n0)
  (eq_level (Level.Var n) (Level.Var n0))

  
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.lSet) true
s:string
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.Level s) false
n:nat
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.Var n) false
s:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.lSet) false
s, s0:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Level s0) (eqb s s0)
s:string
n:nat
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Var n) false
n:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.lSet) false
n:nat
s:string
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Level s) false
n, n0:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Var n0) (eqb n n0)

  
s:string
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.Level s) false
n:nat
reflect (Level.lSet = Level.Var n) false
s:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.lSet) false
s, s0:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Level s0) (eqb s s0)
s:string
n:nat
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Var n) false
n:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.lSet) false
n:nat
s:string
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Level s) false
n, n0:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Var n0) (eqb n n0)

  
s, s0:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Level s0) (eqb s s0)
n, n0:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Var n0) (eqb n n0)

  
s, s0:string
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Level s0) (eqb s s0)
 
s, s0:string
e:s = s0
reflect (Level.Level s = Level.Level s0) true

    
s, s0:string
e:s = s0
Level.Level s = Level.Level s0
 
s, s0:string
e:s = s0
s = s0
 assumption.
  
n, n0:nat
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Var n0) (eqb n n0)
 
n, n0:nat
e:n = n0
reflect (Level.Var n = Level.Var n0) true

    
n, n0:nat
e:n = n0
Level.Var n = Level.Var n0
 
n0:nat
Level.Var n0 = Level.Var n0
 reflexivity.
Defined.

Definition eq_prop_level l1 l2 :=
  match l1, l2 with
  | PropLevel.lProp, PropLevel.lProp => true
  | PropLevel.lSProp, PropLevel.lSProp => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_prop_level : ReflectEq PropLevel.t := {
  eqb := eq_prop_level
}.

forall x y : PropLevel.t,
reflect (x = y) (eq_prop_level x y)

  
reflect (PropLevel.lSProp = PropLevel.lSProp)
  (eq_prop_level PropLevel.lSProp PropLevel.lSProp)
reflect (PropLevel.lSProp = PropLevel.lProp)
  (eq_prop_level PropLevel.lSProp PropLevel.lProp)
reflect (PropLevel.lProp = PropLevel.lSProp)
  (eq_prop_level PropLevel.lProp PropLevel.lSProp)
reflect (PropLevel.lProp = PropLevel.lProp)
  (eq_prop_level PropLevel.lProp PropLevel.lProp)

  
reflect (PropLevel.lSProp = PropLevel.lSProp) true
reflect (PropLevel.lSProp = PropLevel.lProp) false
reflect (PropLevel.lProp = PropLevel.lSProp) false
reflect (PropLevel.lProp = PropLevel.lProp) true

  
reflect (PropLevel.lSProp = PropLevel.lProp) false
reflect (PropLevel.lProp = PropLevel.lSProp) false

  all: try solve [ constructor ; discriminate ].
Defined.

Definition eq_levels (l1 l2 : PropLevel.t + Level.t) :=
  match l1, l2 with
  | inl l, inl l' => eqb l l'
  | inr l, inr l' => eqb l l'
  | _, _ => false
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_levels : ReflectEq (PropLevel.t + Level.t) := {
  eqb := eq_levels
}.

forall x y : PropLevel.t + Level.t,
reflect (x = y) (eq_levels x y)

  
t, t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inl t = inl t0) (eq_levels (inl t) (inl t0))
t:PropLevel.t
t0:Level.t
reflect (inl t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inl t) (inr t0))
t:Level.t
t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inr t = inl t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inl t0))
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inr t0))

  
t, t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inl t = inl t0) (eqb t t0)
t:PropLevel.t
t0:Level.t
reflect (inl t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inl t) (inr t0))
t:Level.t
t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inr t = inl t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inl t0))
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inr t0))
 
t, t0:PropLevel.t
e:t = t0
reflect (inl t = inl t0) true
t, t0:PropLevel.t
n:t <> t0
reflect (inl t = inl t0) false
t:PropLevel.t
t0:Level.t
reflect (inl t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inl t) (inr t0))
t:Level.t
t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inr t = inl t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inl t0))
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inr t0))
 
t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inl t0 = inl t0) true
t, t0:PropLevel.t
n:t <> t0
reflect (inl t = inl t0) false
t:PropLevel.t
t0:Level.t
reflect (inl t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inl t) (inr t0))
t:Level.t
t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inr t = inl t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inl t0))
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inr t0))
 
t, t0:PropLevel.t
n:t <> t0
reflect (inl t = inl t0) false
t:PropLevel.t
t0:Level.t
reflect (inl t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inl t) (inr t0))
t:Level.t
t0:PropLevel.t
reflect (inr t = inl t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inl t0))
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inr t0))

  
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eq_levels (inr t) (inr t0))

  
t, t0:Level.t
reflect (inr t = inr t0) (eqb t t0)
 
t, t0:Level.t
e:t = t0
reflect (inr t = inr t0) true
t, t0:Level.t
n:t <> t0
reflect (inr t = inr t0) false
 
t, t0:Level.t
n:t <> t0
reflect (inr t = inr t0) false

  constructor; cong.
Defined.

Definition eq_prod {A B} (eqA : A -> A -> bool) (eqB : B -> B -> bool) x y :=
  let '(a1, b1) := x in
  let '(a2, b2) := y in
  if eqA a1 a2 then eqB b1 b2
  else false.

Local Obligation Tactic := idtac.
#[program] Instance reflect_prod : forall {A B}, ReflectEq A -> ReflectEq B -> ReflectEq (A * B) := {
  eqb := eq_prod eqb eqb
}.

forall (A B : Type) (H : ReflectEq A)
  (H0 : ReflectEq B) (x y : A √ó B),
reflect (x = y) (eq_prod eqb eqb x y)

  
A, B:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
RB:ReflectEq B
x:A
y:B
u:A
v:B
reflect ((x, y) = (u, v))
  (eq_prod eqb eqb (x, y) (u, v))

  
A, B:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
RB:ReflectEq B
x:A
y:B
u:A
v:B
reflect ((x, y) = (u, v))
  (if eqb x u then eqb y v else false)

  
A, B:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
RB:ReflectEq B
x:A
y:B
u:A
v:B
e:x = u
reflect ((x, y) = (u, v)) (eqb y v)

  
A, B:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
RB:ReflectEq B
x:A
y:B
u:A
v:B
e:x = u
e0:y = v
reflect ((x, y) = (u, v)) true

  
A, B:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
RB:ReflectEq B
u:A
v:B
reflect ((u, v) = (u, v)) true
 
A, B:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
RB:ReflectEq B
u:A
v:B
(u, v) = (u, v)
 reflexivity.
Defined.


forall (A B : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> bool)
  (eqB : B -> B -> bool),
(forall a : A, eqA a a) ->
(forall b : B, eqB b b) ->
forall p : A √ó B, eq_prod eqA eqB p p


forall (A B : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> bool)
  (eqB : B -> B -> bool),
(forall a : A, eqA a a) ->
(forall b : B, eqB b b) ->
forall p : A √ó B, eq_prod eqA eqB p p

  
A, B:Type
eqA:A -> A -> bool
eqB:B -> B -> bool
eqA_refl:forall a0 : A, eqA a0 a0
eqB_refl:forall b0 : B, eqB b0 b0
a:A
b:B
is_true (eq_prod eqA eqB (a, b) (a, b))

  
A, B:Type
eqA:A -> A -> bool
eqB:B -> B -> bool
eqA_refl:forall a0 : A, eqA a0 a0
eqB_refl:forall b0 : B, eqB b0 b0
a:A
b:B
is_true (if eqA a a then eqB b b else false)
 
A, B:Type
eqA:A -> A -> bool
eqB:B -> B -> bool
eqA_refl:forall a0 : A, eqA a0 a0
eqB_refl:forall b0 : B, eqB b0 b0
a:A
b:B
is_true (eqB b b)
 apply eqB_refl.
Qed.

Definition eq_bool b1 b2 : bool :=
  if b1 then b2 else negb b2.

#[program] Instance reflect_bool : ReflectEq bool := {
  eqb := eq_bool
}.

forall x y : bool, reflect (x = y) (eq_bool x y)

  
x, y:bool
reflect (x = y) (eq_bool x y)
 
x, y:bool
reflect (x = y) (if x then y else negb y)

  
reflect (true = true) true
reflect (true = false) false
reflect (false = true) (negb true)
reflect (false = false) (negb false)

  
true = true
true <> false
false <> true
false = false

  
true <> false
false <> true

  all: discriminate.
Defined.

Definition eq_name na nb :=
  match na, nb with
  | nAnon, nAnon => true
  | nNamed a, nNamed b => eqb a b
  | _, _ => false
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_name : ReflectEq name := {
  eqb := eq_name
}.

forall x y : name, reflect (x = y) (eq_name x y)

  
x, y:name
reflect (x = y) (eq_name x y)
 
reflect (nAnon = nAnon) (eq_name nAnon nAnon)
i:ident
reflect (nAnon = nNamed i) (eq_name nAnon (nNamed i))
i:ident
reflect (nNamed i = nAnon) (eq_name (nNamed i) nAnon)
i, i0:ident
reflect (nNamed i = nNamed i0)
  (eq_name (nNamed i) (nNamed i0))

  
reflect (nAnon = nAnon) (eq_name nAnon nAnon)
 
reflect (nAnon = nAnon) true
 
nAnon = nAnon
 reflexivity.
  
i:ident
reflect (nAnon = nNamed i) (eq_name nAnon (nNamed i))
 
i:ident
reflect (nAnon = nNamed i) false
 
i:ident
nAnon <> nNamed i
 discriminate.
  
i:ident
reflect (nNamed i = nAnon) (eq_name (nNamed i) nAnon)
 
i:ident
reflect (nNamed i = nAnon) false
 
i:ident
nNamed i <> nAnon
 discriminate.
  
i, i0:ident
reflect (nNamed i = nNamed i0)
  (eq_name (nNamed i) (nNamed i0))
 
i, i0:ident
reflect (nNamed i = nNamed i0) (eqb i i0)
 
i, i0:ident
e:i = i0
reflect (nNamed i = nNamed i0) true

    
i, i0:ident
e:i = i0
nNamed i = nNamed i0
 
i, i0:ident
e:i = i0
i = i0
 assumption.
Defined.

Definition eq_relevance r r' :=
  match r, r' with
  | Relevant, Relevant => true
  | Irrelevant, Irrelevant => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_relevance : ReflectEq relevance := {
  eqb := eq_relevance
}.

forall x y : relevance,
reflect (x = y) (eq_relevance x y)

  
x, y:relevance
reflect (x = y) (eq_relevance x y)
 
reflect (Relevant = Relevant)
  (eq_relevance Relevant Relevant)
reflect (Relevant = Irrelevant)
  (eq_relevance Relevant Irrelevant)
reflect (Irrelevant = Relevant)
  (eq_relevance Irrelevant Relevant)
reflect (Irrelevant = Irrelevant)
  (eq_relevance Irrelevant Irrelevant)

  
reflect (Relevant = Relevant)
  (eq_relevance Relevant Relevant)
 
reflect (Relevant = Relevant) true
 
Relevant = Relevant
 reflexivity.
  
reflect (Relevant = Irrelevant)
  (eq_relevance Relevant Irrelevant)
 
reflect (Relevant = Irrelevant) false
 
Relevant <> Irrelevant
 discriminate.
  
reflect (Irrelevant = Relevant)
  (eq_relevance Irrelevant Relevant)
 
reflect (Irrelevant = Relevant) false
 
Irrelevant <> Relevant
 discriminate.
  
reflect (Irrelevant = Irrelevant)
  (eq_relevance Irrelevant Irrelevant)
 
reflect (Irrelevant = Irrelevant) true
 now constructor.
Defined.

Definition eq_aname (na nb : binder_annot name) :=
  eqb na.(binder_name) nb.(binder_name) &&
  eqb na.(binder_relevance) nb.(binder_relevance).
  
#[program] Instance reflect_aname : ReflectEq aname := {
  eqb := eq_aname
}.

forall x y : aname, reflect (x = y) (eq_aname x y)

  
x, y:aname
reflect (x = y) (eq_aname x y)
 
x, y:aname
reflect (x = y)
  (eqb (binder_name x) (binder_name y) &&
   eqb (binder_relevance x) (binder_relevance y))

  destruct (eqb_spec x.(binder_name) y.(binder_name));
  destruct (eqb_spec x.(binder_relevance) y.(binder_relevance));
  constructor; destruct x, y; simpl in *; cong.
Defined.

#[program] Instance reflect_kername : ReflectEq kername := {
  eqb := eq_kername
}.

forall x y : kername, reflect (x = y) (eq_kername x y)

  intros; unfold eq_kername; destruct kername_eq_dec; now constructor.
Qed.


#[program] Instance reflect_inductive : ReflectEq inductive := {
  eqb := eq_inductive
}.

forall x y : inductive,
reflect (x = y) (eq_inductive x y)

  
i, i':inductive
reflect (i = i') (eq_inductive i i')
 
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
reflect
  ({| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
   {| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |})
  (eq_kername m m' && (n =? n'))

  
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
reflect
  ({| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
   {| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |})
  (eqb m m' && (n =? n'))

  
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
reflect
  ({| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
   {| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |})
  (eqb m m' && eqb n n')

  
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
e:m = m'
reflect
  ({| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
   {| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |})
  (true && eqb n n')

  
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
e:m = m'
e0:n = n'
reflect
  ({| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
   {| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |})
  (true && true)

  
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
e:m = m'
e0:n = n'
reflect
  ({| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
   {| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |})
  true
 
m:kername
n:nat
m':kername
n':nat
e:m = m'
e0:n = n'
{| inductive_mind := m; inductive_ind := n |} =
{| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |}
 
m':kername
n':nat
{| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |} =
{| inductive_mind := m'; inductive_ind := n' |}
 reflexivity.
Defined.

Definition eq_def {A} `{ReflectEq A} (d1 d2 : def A) : bool :=
  match d1, d2 with
  | mkdef n1 t1 b1 a1, mkdef n2 t2 b2 a2 =>
    eqb n1 n2 && eqb t1 t2 && eqb b1 b2 && eqb a1 a2
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_def : forall {A} `{ReflectEq A}, ReflectEq (def A) := {
  eqb := eq_def
}.

forall (A : Type) (H : ReflectEq A) (x y : def A),
reflect (x = y) (eq_def x y)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
forall x y : def A, reflect (x = y) (eq_def x y)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
x, y:def A
reflect (x = y) (eq_def x y)
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |})
  (eq_def
     {|
     dname := n1;
     dtype := t1;
     dbody := b1;
     rarg := a1 |}
     {|
     dname := n2;
     dtype := t2;
     dbody := b2;
     rarg := a2 |})

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |})
  (eqb n1 n2 && eqb t1 t2 && eqb b1 b2 && eqb a1 a2)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
e:n1 = n2
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |})
  (true && eqb t1 t2 && eqb b1 b2 && eqb a1 a2)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
e:n1 = n2
e0:t1 = t2
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |})
  (true && true && eqb b1 b2 && eqb a1 a2)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
e:n1 = n2
e0:t1 = t2
e1:b1 = b2
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |}) (true && true && true && eqb a1 a2)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
e:n1 = n2
e0:t1 = t2
e1:b1 = b2
e2:a1 = a2
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |}) (true && true && true && true)

  
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
e:n1 = n2
e0:t1 = t2
e1:b1 = b2
e2:a1 = a2
reflect
  ({|
   dname := n1;
   dtype := t1;
   dbody := b1;
   rarg := a1 |} =
   {|
   dname := n2;
   dtype := t2;
   dbody := b2;
   rarg := a2 |}) true
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n1:aname
t1, b1:A
a1:nat
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
e:n1 = n2
e0:t1 = t2
e1:b1 = b2
e2:a1 = a2
{|
dname := n1;
dtype := t1;
dbody := b1;
rarg := a1 |} =
{|
dname := n2;
dtype := t2;
dbody := b2;
rarg := a2 |}
 
A:Type
RA:ReflectEq A
n2:aname
t2, b2:A
a2:nat
{|
dname := n2;
dtype := t2;
dbody := b2;
rarg := a2 |} =
{|
dname := n2;
dtype := t2;
dbody := b2;
rarg := a2 |}
 reflexivity.
Defined.

Fixpoint eq_cast_kind (c c' : cast_kind) : bool :=
  match c, c' with
  | VmCast, VmCast
  | NativeCast, NativeCast
  | Cast, Cast
  | RevertCast, RevertCast => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.

#[program] Instance reflect_cast_kind : ReflectEq cast_kind :=
  { eqb := eq_cast_kind }.

forall x y : cast_kind,
reflect (x = y) (eq_cast_kind x y)

  
reflect (VmCast = VmCast) (eq_cast_kind VmCast VmCast)
reflect (VmCast = NativeCast)
  (eq_cast_kind VmCast NativeCast)
reflect (VmCast = Cast) (eq_cast_kind VmCast Cast)
reflect (VmCast = RevertCast)
  (eq_cast_kind VmCast RevertCast)
reflect (NativeCast = VmCast)
  (eq_cast_kind NativeCast VmCast)
reflect (NativeCast = NativeCast)
  (eq_cast_kind NativeCast NativeCast)
reflect (NativeCast = Cast)
  (eq_cast_kind NativeCast Cast)
reflect (NativeCast = RevertCast)
  (eq_cast_kind NativeCast RevertCast)
reflect (Cast = VmCast) (eq_cast_kind Cast VmCast)
reflect (Cast = NativeCast)
  (eq_cast_kind Cast NativeCast)
reflect (Cast = Cast) (eq_cast_kind Cast Cast)
reflect (Cast = RevertCast)
  (eq_cast_kind Cast RevertCast)
reflect (RevertCast = VmCast)
  (eq_cast_kind RevertCast VmCast)
reflect (RevertCast = NativeCast)
  (eq_cast_kind RevertCast NativeCast)
reflect (RevertCast = Cast)
  (eq_cast_kind RevertCast Cast)
reflect (RevertCast = RevertCast)
  (eq_cast_kind RevertCast RevertCast)
 
reflect (VmCast = VmCast) true
reflect (VmCast = NativeCast) false
reflect (VmCast = Cast) false
reflect (VmCast = RevertCast) false
reflect (NativeCast = VmCast) false
reflect (NativeCast = NativeCast) true
reflect (NativeCast = Cast) false
reflect (NativeCast = RevertCast) false
reflect (Cast = VmCast) false
reflect (Cast = NativeCast) false
reflect (Cast = Cast) true
reflect (Cast = RevertCast) false
reflect (RevertCast = VmCast) false
reflect (RevertCast = NativeCast) false
reflect (RevertCast = Cast) false
reflect (RevertCast = RevertCast) true
 
reflect (VmCast = VmCast) true
reflect (NativeCast = NativeCast) true
reflect (Cast = Cast) true
reflect (RevertCast = RevertCast) true

  
VmCast = VmCast
NativeCast = NativeCast
Cast = Cast
RevertCast = RevertCast
 all: reflexivity.
Defined.

u, v:Universe.t0
u = v <-> u = v


u, v:Universe.t0
u = v <-> u = v

  
t_set:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set = false
t_set0:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne0:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set0 = false
{| Universe.t_set := t_set; Universe.t_ne := t_ne |} =
{| Universe.t_set := t_set0; Universe.t_ne := t_ne0 |} ->
t_set = t_set0
t_set:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set = false
t_set0:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne0:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set0 = false
t_set = t_set0 ->
{| Universe.t_set := t_set; Universe.t_ne := t_ne |} =
{| Universe.t_set := t_set0; Universe.t_ne := t_ne0 |}
 
t_set:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set = false
t_set0:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne0:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set0 = false
t_set = t_set0 ->
{| Universe.t_set := t_set; Universe.t_ne := t_ne |} =
{| Universe.t_set := t_set0; Universe.t_ne := t_ne0 |}

  
t_set0:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne, t_ne0:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set0 = false
{| Universe.t_set := t_set0; Universe.t_ne := t_ne |} =
{| Universe.t_set := t_set0; Universe.t_ne := t_ne0 |}
 
t_set0:UnivExprSet.t
t_ne, t_ne0:UnivExprSet.is_empty t_set0 = false
t_ne = t_ne0
 apply uip.
Qed.

u, v:Universe.t0
u = v <->
UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v


u, v:Universe.t0
u = v <->
UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v

  
u, v:Universe.t0
u = v <-> ?y
u, v:Universe.t0
?y <-> UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v
 
u, v:Universe.t0
u = v <->
UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v

  
u1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
u2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok u1
v1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
v2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok v1
{| UnivExprSet.this := u1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := u2 |} =
{| UnivExprSet.this := v1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := v2 |} ->
u1 = v1
u1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
u2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok u1
v1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
v2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok v1
u1 = v1 ->
{| UnivExprSet.this := u1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := u2 |} =
{| UnivExprSet.this := v1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := v2 |}

  
u1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
u2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok u1
v1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
v2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok v1
u1 = v1 ->
{| UnivExprSet.this := u1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := u2 |} =
{| UnivExprSet.this := v1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := v2 |}
 
v1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
u2, v2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok v1
{| UnivExprSet.this := v1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := u2 |} =
{| UnivExprSet.this := v1; UnivExprSet.is_ok := v2 |}
 
v1:UnivExprSet.Raw.t
u2, v2:UnivExprSet.Raw.Ok v1
u2 = v2
 apply uip.
Qed.

EqDec UnivExpr.t


EqDec UnivExpr.t
 
e, e':UnivExpr.t
{e = e'} + {e <> e'}
 repeat decide equality. Qed.


EqDec Universe.t0


EqDec Universe.t0

  
u, v:Universe.t0
{u = v} + {u <> v}

  
u, v:Universe.t0
{UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v} +
{UnivExprSet.elements u <> UnivExprSet.elements v}
u, v:Universe.t0
H:{UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v}
+
{UnivExprSet.elements u <> UnivExprSet.elements v}
{u = v} + {u <> v}
 
u, v:Universe.t0
{UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v} +
{UnivExprSet.elements u <> UnivExprSet.elements v}

    repeat decide equality. 
u, v:Universe.t0
H:{UnivExprSet.elements u = UnivExprSet.elements v}
+
{UnivExprSet.elements u <> UnivExprSet.elements v}
{u = v} + {u <> v}

  
u, v:Universe.t0
H:UnivExprSet.elements u <> UnivExprSet.elements v
u <> v

  intro X; apply H; now apply eq_universe_iff' in X.
Defined.


EqDec Universe.t


EqDec Universe.t

  
forall x y : Universe.t, {x = y} + {x <> y}
 
x, y:Universe.t
t, t0:Universe.t0
{t = t0} + {t <> t0}

  apply eq_dec_univ0.
Defined.

Instance reflect_eq_univ : ReflectEq Universe.t := EqDec_ReflectEq _.

Instance reflect_case_info : ReflectEq case_info := EqDec_ReflectEq case_info.

Definition eq_sig_true {A f} `{ReflectEq A} (x y : { z : A | f z = true }) : bool :=
  let '(exist x hx) := x in
  let '(exist y hy) := y in
  eqb x y.

#[program] Instance reflect_sig_true {A f} `{ReflectEq A} : ReflectEq ({ z : A | f z = true }) := {
  eqb := eq_sig_true
}.

forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (H : ReflectEq A)
  (x y : {z : A | f z = true}),
reflect (x = y) (eq_sig_true x y)

  
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
forall x y : {z : A | f z = true},
reflect (x = y) (eq_sig_true x y)
 
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
x:A
hx:f x = true
y:A
hy:f y = true
reflect
  (exist (fun z : A => f z = true) x hx =
   exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy)
  (eq_sig_true (exist (fun z : A => f z = true) x hx)
     (exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy))
 
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
x:A
hx:f x = true
y:A
hy:f y = true
reflect
  (exist (fun z : A => f z = true) x hx =
   exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy) (eqb x y)

  
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
x:A
hx:f x = true
y:A
hy:f y = true
e:x = y
reflect
  (exist (fun z : A => f z = true) x hx =
   exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy) true
 
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
y:A
hx, hy:f y = true
reflect
  (exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hx =
   exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy) true

  
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
y:A
hx, hy:f y = true
exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hx =
exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy
 
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
y:A
hx, hy:f y = true
H:hx = hy
exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hx =
exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy
 
A:Type
f:A -> bool
RA:ReflectEq A
y:A
hy:f y = true
exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy =
exist (fun z : A => f z = true) y hy
 reflexivity.
Defined.

Derive NoConfusion NoConfusionHom for sig.
Derive NoConfusion NoConfusionHom for prod.

Definition eqb_context_decl {term : Type} (eqterm : term -> term -> bool) 
  (x y : BasicAst.context_decl term) :=
  let (na, b, ty) := x in
  let (na', b', ty') := y in
  eqb na na' && eq_option eqterm b b' && eqterm ty ty'.


term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
ReflectEq (context_decl term)


term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
ReflectEq (context_decl term)

  
term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
forall x y : context_decl term,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_context_decl eqb x y)

  
term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
x, y:context_decl term
reflect (x = y) (eqb_context_decl eqb x y)

  
term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
na:aname
b:option term
ty:term
na':aname
b':option term
ty':term
reflect
  ({|
   decl_name := na;
   decl_body := b;
   decl_type := ty |} =
   {|
   decl_name := na';
   decl_body := b';
   decl_type := ty' |})
  (eqb_context_decl eqb
     {|
     decl_name := na;
     decl_body := b;
     decl_type := ty |}
     {|
     decl_name := na';
     decl_body := b';
     decl_type := ty' |})
 
term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
na:aname
b:option term
ty:term
na':aname
b':option term
ty':term
reflect
  ({|
   decl_name := na;
   decl_body := b;
   decl_type := ty |} =
   {|
   decl_name := na';
   decl_body := b';
   decl_type := ty' |})
  (eqb na na' && eq_option eqb b b' && eqb ty ty')

  
term:Type
Ht:ReflectEq term
na:aname
b:option term
ty:term
na':aname
b':option term
ty':term
reflect
  ({|
   decl_name := na;
   decl_body := b;
   decl_type := ty |} =
   {|
   decl_name := na';
   decl_body := b';
   decl_type := ty' |})
  (eqb na na' && eqb b b' && eqb ty ty')

  destruct (eqb_spec na na'); subst;
    destruct (eqb_spec b b'); subst;
      destruct (eqb_spec ty ty'); subst; constructor; congruence.
Qed.

Definition eqb_recursivity_kind r r' :=
  match r, r' with
  | Finite, Finite => true
  | CoFinite, CoFinite => true
  | BiFinite, BiFinite => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.


ReflectEq recursivity_kind


ReflectEq recursivity_kind

  
forall x y : recursivity_kind,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_recursivity_kind x y)

  destruct x, y; simpl; constructor; congruence.
Defined.

Definition eqb_ConstraintType x y :=
  match x, y with
  | ConstraintType.Le n, ConstraintType.Le m => Z.eqb n m
  | ConstraintType.Eq, ConstraintType.Eq => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.


ReflectEq ConstraintType.t


ReflectEq ConstraintType.t

  
forall x y : ConstraintType.t_,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_ConstraintType x y)

  
z, z0:Z
reflect (ConstraintType.Le z = ConstraintType.Le z0)
  (z =? z0)%Z

  
z, z0:Z
e:z = z0
ConstraintType.Le z = ConstraintType.Le z0
z, z0:Z
n:z <> z0
ConstraintType.Le z <> ConstraintType.Le z0
 
z, z0:Z
n:z <> z0
ConstraintType.Le z <> ConstraintType.Le z0

  cong.
Defined.

Definition eqb_ConstraintSet x y :=
  eqb (ConstraintSet.this x) (ConstraintSet.this y).


ReflectEq ConstraintSet.t


ReflectEq ConstraintSet.t

  
forall x y : ConstraintSet.t_,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_ConstraintSet x y)

  
thisx:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
reflect
  ({| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |} =
   {| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |})
  (eqb_ConstraintSet
     {| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |}
     {| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |})

  
thisx:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
reflect
  ({| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |} =
   {| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |})
  (eqb
     (ConstraintSet.this
        {| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |})
     (ConstraintSet.this
        {| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |}))

  
thisx:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
reflect
  ({| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |} =
   {| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |})
  (eqb thisx thisy)

  
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx, oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
{| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := okx |} =
{| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |}
thisx:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
n:thisx <> thisy
{| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |} <>
{| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |}

  
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx, oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
{| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := okx |} =
{| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |}
 f_equal; apply uip.
  
thisx:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
okx:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:ConstraintSet.Raw.t
oky:ConstraintSet.Raw.Ok thisy
n:thisx <> thisy
{| CS.this := thisx; CS.is_ok := okx |} <>
{| CS.this := thisy; CS.is_ok := oky |}
 congruence.
Defined.

Definition eqb_LevelSet x y :=
  eqb (LevelSet.this x) (LevelSet.this y).


ReflectEq LevelSet.t


ReflectEq LevelSet.t

  
forall x y : LevelSet.t_,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_LevelSet x y)

  
thisx:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
reflect
  ({| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |} =
   {| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |})
  (eqb_LevelSet
     {| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |}
     {| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |})

  
thisx:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
reflect
  ({| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |} =
   {| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |})
  (eqb
     (LevelSet.this
        {| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |})
     (LevelSet.this
        {| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |}))

  
thisx:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
reflect
  ({| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |} =
   {| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |})
  (eqb thisx thisy)

  
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx, oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
{| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := okx |} =
{| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |}
thisx:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
n:thisx <> thisy
{| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |} <>
{| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |}

  
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx, oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
{| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := okx |} =
{| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |}
 f_equal; apply uip.
  
thisx:LevelSet.Raw.t
okx:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisx
thisy:LevelSet.Raw.t
oky:LevelSet.Raw.Ok thisy
n:thisx <> thisy
{| LS.this := thisx; LS.is_ok := okx |} <>
{| LS.this := thisy; LS.is_ok := oky |}
 congruence.
Defined.

Definition eqb_universes_decl x y :=
  match x, y with
  | Monomorphic_ctx cx, Monomorphic_ctx cy => eqb cx cy
  | Polymorphic_ctx cx, Polymorphic_ctx cy => eqb cx cy
  | _, _ => false
  end.

Ltac finish_reflect :=
  (repeat
    match goal with
    | |- context[eqb ?a ?b] => destruct (eqb_spec a b); [subst|constructor; congruence]
    end);
  constructor; trivial; congruence.


ReflectEq universes_decl


ReflectEq universes_decl

  
forall x y : universes_decl,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_universes_decl x y)

  
forall x y : universes_decl,
reflect (x = y)
  match x with
  | Monomorphic_ctx cx =>
      match y with
      | Monomorphic_ctx cy => eqb cx cy
      | Polymorphic_ctx _ => false
      end
  | Polymorphic_ctx cx =>
      match y with
      | Monomorphic_ctx _ => false
      | Polymorphic_ctx cy => eqb cx cy
      end
  end

  intros [] []; finish_reflect.
Defined.

Definition eqb_allowed_eliminations x y :=
  match x, y with
  | IntoSProp, IntoSProp
  | IntoPropSProp, IntoPropSProp
  | IntoSetPropSProp, IntoSetPropSProp
  | IntoAny, IntoAny => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.


ReflectEq allowed_eliminations


ReflectEq allowed_eliminations

  
forall x y : allowed_eliminations,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_allowed_eliminations x y)

  intros [] []; simpl; constructor; congruence.
Defined.

Local Infix "==?" := eqb (at level 20).

Definition eqb_Variance x y :=
  match x, y with
  | Variance.Irrelevant, Variance.Irrelevant
  | Variance.Covariant, Variance.Covariant
  | Variance.Invariant, Variance.Invariant => true
  | _, _ => false
  end.


ReflectEq Variance.t


ReflectEq Variance.t

  
forall x y : Variance.t,
reflect (x = y) (eqb_Variance x y)

  intros [] []; constructor; congruence.
Defined.
